mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of Congressman Moore being invited to the Rose Bowl by the Weirton High School Band
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Weirton High School Band inviting Congressman Arch A. Moore, Jr to accompany them to the Rose Bowl. Extending the invitation to Moore on the steps of the House of Representatives are Director Charles McKinny, Commander Don Strope, Lt. Matthew Buzzetta, and Assistant Director Dale Lutton.
